preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 10 g of aluminum, 5 g of boron, 4 g of europium, and 28 g of nickel using an analytical balance.
 2. In a clean, dry container, combine the aluminum and boron powder thoroughly using a spatula.
 3. Gradually add the europium and nickel to the mixture, ensuring even distribution. Mix for 5-10 minutes until uniformly blended.
